parameters: I still have time to go to town, I want to pet a horse!
(What is it? Is there a horse?)
This sword is not bad at all.
(Wow, I can almost see her breasts!)
I'm gonna pet you righ now, hehehe.
Era was reaching for the horse when suddenly!..
Aha! You fell into my trap!
I had to wait for so long before someone came up...
But now I'm finally going to have some fun!
Era automatically turned around and at that moment the monster tore
Hey, you! Give my bikini back!
There's a lot of people, I can't run past them looking
(He ran away... And I didn't even see where...)
(So what now? Can I go into town like this?..)
(I don't have a choice, I don't want to fail this
assignment, so I'll have to go like this...)
If I'll be careful, no one will see anything...
Roll up and buy, only today!
Best merchandise at the best prices only today!
(Such a pretty girl, and dressed so cool.)
Hello, do you want to go out sometime?
Uh, I bought so many things!
(Wow, does she go without a bra? She is so brave!)
Thanks! I'm a hunter after all!
(Yay! The first real assignment! And finally in town!)
(It looks like some kind of spontaneous fair.)
